title: understand reshipping
extract: To understand someone means to know how they feel and why they behave in the way that they do. It would be nice to have someone who really understood me, a friend. [ VERB noun] Trish had not exactly understood his feelings. [
extract_html: To understand someone means to know how they feel and why they behave in the way that they do. It would be nice to have someone who really understood me, a friend. [ VERB noun] Trish had not exactly understood his feelings. [
